name: Instant Pot® Roasted Garlic
author: Bren
summary: The color won't be the same as when roasted in the oven but the flavor is wonderful! Use the garlic to make garlic bread, aioli... the possibilities are endless. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
directions: Place the steamer basket in the bottom of a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Add water up to the bottom of the steamer basket
Cut 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic bulb and place into the steamer basket
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt
Select Poultry function according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes
Remove garlic and cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes
Squeeze garlic pulp into a glass jar and refrigerate
